description: Request for scoping opinion to demolish the existing building and construct a 31 storey building for office use (Class B1) with retail floorspace (Class A1-A4), an office lobby and loading bay at ground floor, an area of retail floorspace (Class A1-A3) at fourth floor level, a publicly accessible terrace at fourth floor level, five levels of plant on the top floors, one level of plant (with mezzanine level) at the mid-levels, and one level of ancillary basement plant (with mezzanine level), and cycle parking and cycle facilities at mezzanine level.    The maximum height of the proposed development would be approximately 176.6 m AOD subject to further consultations with the relevant bodies, and would provide approximately 50,382 sqm GIA of office space (B1) and approximately 796 sqm GIA of retail (A1-A4).  This application will be accompanied by an Environmental Statement under the above regulations.
